title: 28 February 2019 Mogadishu bombings
categories: Attacks on buildings and structures in 2019
Attacks on buildings and structures in Mogadishu
Car and truck bombings in Somalia
Improvised explosive device bombings in Mogadishu
infobox: {{Infobox civilian attack|date=28 February 2019|fatalities=30+|injuries=60+|location=[[Mogadishu]], Somalia|partof=[[Somali Civil War (2009–present)]]|perps=[[Al-Shabaab (militant group)|Al-Shabaab]]|title=28 February 2019 Mogadishu bombings|type=[[Car bombing]]}}
article:
On 28 February 2019 at least 30 people were killed and 60 others injured in three car bombing attacks followed by a siege in Mogadishu. The cars exploded near the Maka al-Mukarama hotel. The attack happened in Makka Al-mukarama road which was very busy at the time. Al-Shabaab has claimed responsibility for the attack.
